item.title: Using Org Mode in Hugo
item.description: First level heading Second level heading A source code example # 词性标注 import nltk import pycrfsuite import numpy as np import pandas as pd train_data = pd.read_csv('msra_train_bio_simple.txt',sep='\t',header=None) test_data = pd.read_csv('msra_test_bio_simple.txt',sep='\t',header=None) Other syntax examples Testing BOLD syntax. Testing italic syntax. Testing underlined. Testing deleted. LaTex \begin{equation*} ∑_1^n i = \frac{n (n +1)}{2} \end{equation*}
